course_description: A gentle introduction to programming problem-solving for absolute beginners. Each day builds upon the previous, creating a solid foundation in computational thinking and basic algorithms.

fortnight_1.title: Getting Started with Problem Solving
fortnight_1.description: Learn the basics of breaking down problems and thinking algorithmically

fortnight_2.title: Intermediate Concepts & Practice
fortnight_2.description: Dive deeper into data manipulation and more complex problem solving

milestone_projects.title: Duplicate Detective
milestone_projects.description: Build a program to find duplicates in various datasets

milestone_projects.title: Word Wizard
milestone_projects.description: Create an anagram solver and word game

milestone_projects.title: Math Master
milestone_projects.description: Implement a calculator with advanced operations

daily_structure.reflection: 5-10 minutes of code review and notes

completion_rewards.next_steps: Ready for AlgoTime Summer 2025 or JavaScript Interview Prep
